name: Ballerina Dress Up: Girls Game
description:
Ballet is a beautiful art! If you dream to become a ballet dancer one day here is a free ballerina dress up game for you where you can dress up 6 dolls as beautiful ballerinas! Develop your fashionista skills and learn about fashion, clothes and outfits used in stage performances in this dressup girl game.

200+ items are available in this game for free, no-purchases or other annoying stuff typical for other dress up games out there. Pick gorgeous dresses, skirts, tops and many other categories of clothing items for you ballerina.

We have other new games for girls about dancing and dancers. Just click on the link "More from Lepshy" to download all our games on your Android phone or tablet and play for free, without shopping inside!
